amendment.description: To provide for a reserve fund for legislation that funds the traumatic brain injury program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4297 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4297 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2065) To provide for a reserve fund for legislation that funds the traumatic brain injury program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4297 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4297 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Hatch.
